definitions: To clean with water and, typically, soap or detergent.
To remove dirt, stain, or other unwanted matter from something by cleaning with water.
To be carried or swept away by water.
To flow over or against something.
To withstand laundering without damage or loss of color.
examples: Please wash your hands before dinner.
The rain will wash away the pollen.
The waves wash against the shore.
I need to wash the dishes.
